# error

**Instance Property**

The error that caused the player item to fail.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is an error that describes what caused the player item to no longer be able to be played.

If the receiver’s status is not [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/failed], the value of this property is `nil`.

## Determining readiness

- **status**: The status of the player item.
- **AVPlayerItem.Status**: The statuses for a player item.
